import React from "react"; const AboutScreen = () => (

SOBRE NOSOTROS


Somos un grupo formado por especialistas en la industria de los videojuegos y



We started 5 years ago and this last year we won the ECOM 2021 awards.



We offer 24/7 support if you want to contact us this is our email info@tryhard.com



Rating

We allow our users to leave ratings so that you can choose what is most recommended.

FAST SHIPPING

We improved our shipments and now we arrive at your home in 24 hours.

Winners

We won first place in the ECOM 2020 awards.

); export default AboutScreen;
